definition: to be stranded (of ship)/to run aground/fig. to run into difficulties and stop
to run aground in mid-course/to run into difficulty and stop

sentences.english: Many boats have run aground on the sandbar at the river mouth.
sentences.chinese: 许多船只在河口的沙堤搁浅。

sentences.english: Once Hancock was summoned to the aid of a whale that had washed up on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 有一回，汉考克被人召唤去解救一头搁浅的鲸鱼。

sentences.english: Stranded wonderful spread tongue, is like a song you dance the last empress dowager.
sentences.chinese: 舌间搁浅的妙蔓，是想为你舞一曲最后倾国倾城。

sentences.english: But consistent lying -- even about minor matters -- can unglue a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 但是一些小事上惹出的连篇谎话都能导致婚姻搁浅。

sentences.english: He twitched like a dying fish stranded on a beach.
sentences.chinese: 他扯扯像搁浅在海滩上一个垂死的鱼。

sentences.english: But consistent lying — even about minor matters — can unglue a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 但是一些小事上惹出的连篇谎话都能导致婚姻搁浅。

sentences.english: When he sees Nils' tinnie stranded on the beach Jack fears the worst.
sentences.chinese: 当他看见尼尔斯的锡船搁浅在海滩时，杰克甚为恐惧。

sentences.english: Experts are unable to explain why the whales beached themselves.
sentences.chinese: 专家们无法解释为什么这些鲸会搁浅在海滩上。

sentences.english: His plans, however, came to a halt after the destruction of the first Death Star.
sentences.chinese: 然而，第一颗死星被炸毁后，他的计划就搁浅了。

sentences.english: Missing you, I open my memory delicately, only to find that I never stranded my missing at all.
sentences.chinese: 想你，把记忆轻启后，才明白我不曾把思念搁浅。

sentences.english: The ship ran aground where there should have been a depth of 35ft.
sentences.chinese: 船搁浅在水深本应为35英尺的地方。

sentences.english: Boats often pile up on the rocks in the shallow water.
sentences.chinese: 船常常在浅水处触礁搁浅。

sentences.english: They were winning the boat race until their boat ran aground on a sandbank.
sentences.chinese: 上搁浅之前，他们在划船比赛中一直是领先的。

sentences.english: An attack by a krayt dragon derailed their escape plans.
sentences.chinese: 他们在路上遭到一头克雷特龙的攻击，出逃计划搁浅。

sentences.english: At least six large boats have been stranded near the port city of Iquitos.
sentences.chinese: 在港口城市伊基托斯附近，至少有六艘大船搁浅。

definition: (of a ship) to strike a reef/(fig.) to hit a snag
to drop anchor/to break down (of a car etc)
(of a boat) to reach the shore/to pull toward shore/close to shore/landfall
to salvage/to dredge/to fish out (person or object from the sea)
to capsize/(fig.) to suffer a setback or defeat
